summary: GENTURIX Platform CRUD Forms Testing - Comprehensive testing of all create/update/delete flows across the platform. Backend: 33/33 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All CRUD forms verified working with proper validation, success/error feedback, and UI updates.

categories_tested: Authentication (4 tests) - All roles login successfully
User Management CRUD (3 tests) - Create resident/guard, update status
Areas CRUD (4 tests) - Create, get, update, delete areas
Reservations CRUD (2 tests) - Create reservation, admin approval
Visitor Authorizations CRUD (9 tests) - All 4 types, update, delete, guard check-in/out
HR Module CRUD (5 tests) - Absence requests, evaluations, clock in/out
Security Module (3 tests) - Panic alerts, resolution, history
Error Handling (3 tests) - Missing fields, invalid data validation

features_verified: Create User form opens with 'Crear Usuario' button
Form validation works - shows error for empty required fields
Form has all fields: Nombre Completo, Email, Contraseña (auto-generated), Rol, Teléfono
Role selector with all options (Residente, Guarda, HR, Supervisor, Estudiante)
Option to send credentials by email
47 status toggles found for user activation/deactivation
Create Area form with 'Nueva Área' button
Form fields: Nombre, Tipo, Capacidad, Desde/Hasta hours, Max horas/reservas, Días disponibles, Descripción, Reglas, Requiere aprobación toggle
Edit Area form loads with existing data
5 Edit buttons and 5 Delete buttons found for areas
Tabs: Áreas, Mis Reservas, Pendientes
Create Authorization form with 'Nueva Autorización' button
Form fields: Nombre del Visitante, Cédula/ID, Placa Vehículo, Tipo de Autorización, Fecha Desde/Hasta, Notas
4 authorization type options available (single_visit, recurring, temporary, permanent)
Existing authorizations show with Edit and Delete buttons
Status badges (Válida, No autorizado hoy)
Evaluación de Desempeño: Nueva Evaluación form with employee selector, star ratings (Disciplina, Puntualidad, Desempeño, Comunicación), comments
Solicitudes de Ausencia: Nueva Solicitud button
Reclutamiento: Nuevo Candidato button with pipeline stages
Planificación de Turnos: Nuevo Turno button
9 tabs for HR functions
Resident: 3 panic buttons (Emergencia Médica, Actividad Sospechosa, Emergencia General)
Resident: Llamar al 911 button
Resident: Mis Alertas tab shows alert history with status badges
Guard: Alertas tab shows 2 active alerts requiring attention
Guard: Check-In tab with search, manual entry, SALIDA buttons for checkout
Guard: Mi Turno tab with REGISTRAR ENTRADA button, shift info, absences

seed_data_creation: Test data created during backend tests (test users, areas, authorizations, panic alerts)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CRUD forms tested and working. Backend API tests cover all major endpoints. Frontend forms have proper validation, success/error feedback. No frozen states detected. Platform is stable for all CRUD operations.
